page.title: 20Needs For The Future Of Dent
page.content: Interviewing local inhabitants, and discussing the future of life in this dale proved to be most interesting. Adults and children see the need for some local Leisure Centre with a swimming pool,badminton and squash courts,B.M.X.track,and general safe play area.The building design should blend in with the dale,so as not to spoil the scenery,even underground. A few more shops would be welcome like a clothing shop and bakers,and more homes at a reasonable price for local young couples. People would also like to have a policeman in the village again. On the whole most inhabitants are satisfied with life as it is in Dent, although the elderly find the journey to hospital a worry as it can take the best part of a day.Fortunately people in the area are reasonably healthy.
